parameters.name: Folder
parameters.description: Folder in which to search for documents whose references to update

title: IRenamedDocumentReferences.AddSearchFolder
description: Adds the specified folder in which to search for documents whose references to update.

parameters.name: Folder
parameters.description: Folder in which to search for documents whose references to update

returns: True if the specified folder is added to the search, false if not
remarks:
This method is only available if
IRenamedDocumentReferences::UpdateWhereUsedReferences
is true.
